name: IsolationIsland
description:
In this game you must build a small town on a island. You must build your population to grow although you must also build your food production. If you get to or below 0 then you loose the game. You must build farms to build your food, houses to build population and mills and mines to automatically gather wood and stone. You must cut down tree's and mine rocks to gather stone. 

Controls:

Escape - Pause

WASD - Movement

B - Build menu

1 - House

2 - Farm

3 - Wood Mill

4 - Mine
